name: Mundo de Oz
description:
Is an history of a brave soldier who has retired at the age of 30 so he needs a job to fullfil his needs. But on the way to another town looking for a better live, finds that this places is haunted and having a sort of problems with magic creatures. As he finds a job as mercenary he must end this magic creatures.

Many thing are hide and exploration is grate. A full story to remember this days of halloween.
